sentences.english: The interconnection of the monitoring system of large irrigating area is a physical platform of digital irrigating area.

sentences.english: The interconnection of the monitoring system of large irrigating area is a physical platform of digital irrigating area.

sentences.english: Expedite Water Saving Tune-up, Push forward Reform and Promote Sustainable Development of the Irrigated area.
sentences.chinese: 狠抓節水改造積極推進改革促進灌區可持續發展。

sentences.english: The gap between the supply and demand is complemented by the waters here.
sentences.chinese: 合肥用水的缺口就是依靠淠史杭灌區填補。

sentences.english: According to the measured data, the sediment deposition in the canal system of Weishan Irrigation District was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 根據實測資料，分析位山灌區渠系泥沙淤積問題。

sentences.english: Sangganhe Irrigation District on the upper reaches of Yongdinghe River is one of large-scale artesian irrigation districts in Shanxi province.
sentences.chinese: 永定河上游桑乾河灌區是山西省大型自流灌區之一。

sentences.english: Sangganhe Irrigation District on the upper reaches of Yongdinghe River is one of large-scale artesian irrigation districts in Shanxi province.
sentences.chinese: 永定河上游桑乾河灌區是山西省大型自流灌區之一。

sentences.english: In the end, this paper also present points of sediments rational utilization in the Yellow River irrigation district and the ways …
sentences.chinese: 提出了引黃灌區泥沙資源的合理利用與優化配置途徑。

sentences.english: The problem of the sediment is beginning playing a important role in the development and building of Yellow River irrigation district more and more.
sentences.chinese: 泥沙問題越來越嚴重地影響到引黃灌區的建設與發展。

sentences.english: Shaoshan Irrigation Area building is a worthy monument of history.
sentences.chinese: 韶山灌區的建設不愧是一座歷史的豐碑。

sentences.english: Water-saving modification works usually result in a large amount of spoil .
sentences.chinese: 景電一期灌區是全國大型灌區節水改造重點工程之一。

sentences.english: In this paper, the application of the piping in canal irrigation district is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文闡述了管道輸水灌溉在渠灌區中的應用形式。

sentences.english: Head-end measurement method is applied in sample irrigation districts.
sentences.chinese: 樣點灌區採用首尾測算分析方法。

sentences.english: Zhenlai irrigation area is located at the Songnen plain on the west bank of Nenjiang river in the northwestward of Jilin province.
sentences.chinese: 鎮賚灌區位於吉林省西北部邊緣嫩江西岸松嫩平原。

sentences.english: In water-saving irrigation projects, concrete-lined channel is of great importance.
sentences.chinese: 在灌區節水項目建設中，渠道砼襯砌佔有重要地位。
